name: ProtoReality Games
description: The first title from ProtoReality Games is Derivative Outstation 119. It is the world's first mobile immersive metaverse play & earn game on the Solana blockchain. Set in the dystopian future, it is an open-world sci-fi action game with a rich storyline. The game has a variety of action-focused gameplay, allowing players to navigate through a futuristic world full of interaction (both Player versus Player (PvP) and Player versus Environment (PvE). Token Generation Event (TGE) took place on 26 February. $PRGC started trading on Raydium and now weâ€™re also on MEXC. $PRGC is a key to our in-game economy for gameplay, buying, selling and spending within D.O. 119 and all our upcoming games.
